title: Motion Universe
description: Motion Universe comes with a huge amount of files with over 3600+ SFX, truly giving you endless possibilities.
longDescription:
Audio demo


Motion Universe is a whoosh & motion graphics sound library featuring 3611 video game sound effects. This focused sound library gives you a hybrid mix of imaginative sound sets for common and abstract game actions like casting magic spells, fiery pass bys, ice swooshes, robotic mechanism transitions, vines growing, liquid entropy whooshes, earthy attacks, summons, unlocks, shimmering reveals, orbs, flaps, swings, slides, pop ups, enchants, swells, and granular designed textures useful in many cases where motion is needed. With game developers and sound designers in mind, we carefully handcrafted these game ready audio assets so that you can have a multitude of options. This library will cover many of your bases and needs in regards to pacing, whoosh speeds, style types, all delivered as neatly organized completed sound sets so your sounds never get old or annoying. 


  • 3600+ sound effects
  • 2.25 GB of sounds
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav


Motion Universe sound effects library provides you with the versatile whoosh sfx you will need to complete almost any of your projects. You can hear the mages' magic fireballs, ice crystals flying by, morphing electricity buffs, snowy gusts of winds, handheld weapon swings as well as a classic assortment of elemental whooshes, scifi dopplers, tonal hums, sails rustling, layered cloth whips & much more. All designed sounds come with multiple variation files making up a complete sound set. Each sound set usually contains 5-15 variations so you can easily add the perfect amount of modulated dynamics and layers of whoosh sound in your video games and film so they don’t sound repetitive and boring. Motion Universe is an excellent library to bolster your existing sound banks or starter pack for those who need to have a solid foundation of transitions, whooshes & motion graphics for different surfaces, sound category styles, sound types and more.  


Endless Possibilities & Uses


Explore through an inspired by futuristic, fantasy and MMORPG game motion library and you’ll hear an interesting range of hard to find sounds from vines breathing life, creaking trees gusts, spells, enchants, upgrades, unlocks, all made in a cinematic style. Motion Universe comes with a huge amount of files with over 3600+ SFX, truly giving you endless possibilities. All sounds are layered, mastered and designed to be game ready but versatile enough to further edit, mix and match to your liking! The library was developed to be a modular and useful sound bank allowing you to unique sonic aesthetics for years to come. It will be like a gift that keeps giving. A lot of these sound sets have many different use cases. For example Vegetation_Invasive_Roots sound set could be an earthy magic spell or Shine_Bell_Shing sound set could be a positive mobile app game notification.


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata 


All sound effects labelling is UCS compliant & is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures: Cloth, Dark, Earth, Electricity, Fire, Ice, Liquid, Mechanisms, Metal, Scifi, Shine, Vegetation, Weapons, Wind & more. On top of UCS, Motion Universe - Game Whoosh & Motion Graphic Sound Sets features extensive metadata embedded in the files using soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time as well.


Product Details:

  • 3611 footstep sound effects files
  • 2.25 GB of samples
  • All in 44k 16bit .wav
  • 14+ sound category styles 
  • Includes embedded Soundminer metadata
  • UCS Compliant
  • 217 Designed - Cloth
  • 323 Designed - Dark
  • 195 Designed - Earth
  • 216 Designed - Electricity
  • 317 Designed - Fire
  • 209 Designed - Ice
  • 346 Designed - Liquid/Water
  • 236 Designed - Mechanisms
  • 390 Designed - Metals
  • 345 Designed - Sci-fi
  • 226 Designed - Shines, Shimmers, Reveals
  • 202 Designed - Vegetation/Vines
  • 175 Designed - Weapons
  • 214 Designed - Wind
  • RTU-OTB (Ready to be used out of the box)
